title: Plum and apple meringue tart
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) plain white flour', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '50 g (1¾ oz) 70 per cent fat spread, diced', '1 egg white', 'For the filling', '600 g (1 lb 5 oz) Bramley apples', '90 g (3¼ oz) caster sugar', 'Finely grated zest of 1 lemon', 'Juice of ½ lemon', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) sweet, purple dessert plums, such as Victoria', 'For the meringue', '2 egg whites', '80 g (3 oz) caster sugar']
